snippet.title: Photos give insight into Russian President Vladimir Putin's past
snippet.content:
Vladimir Putin pictured in his younger years. Picture: Zumapress.com/Australscope
Share
PHOTOS of Russian leader Vladimir Putin give a taste of the simple life he lived before he rose to power to lead one of the world's largest nations. The photos show a softer side of the baby-faced president as he stands with him mum and wrestles with a classmate. The photos also show Putin nursing his baby daughter and playing with a dog. Putin has held Russian office since 2012 but there are many facts not known about the president. According to , Putin has a black belt in judo and grew up with three other families in a communal apartment.
